names.description: Name of Simyra in eighth- and seventh-century-BC Assyrian sources, including royal inscriptions of the kings Tiglath-pileser III (r. 745-727 BC) and Sargon II (r. 721-705 BC).

names.description: Ethnic name used to designate a person from Simyra in Neo-Assyrian administrative texts and letters.
